channel.title: math.GN updates on arXiv.org
channel.description: math.GN updates on the arXiv.org e-print archive.

item.title: Sequences suffice for pointfree uniform completions
item.description: arXiv:2409.15569v1 Announce Type: new Abstract: Completions of metric spaces are usually constructed using Cauchy sequences. However, this does not work for general uniform spaces, where Cauchy filters or nets must be used instead. The situation in pointfree topology is more straightforward: the correct completion of uniform locales can indeed be obtained as a quotient of a locale of Cauchy sequences.
item.dc:creator: Graham Manuell

item.title: Some properties of selectively star-ccc spaces
item.description: arXiv:2409.15726v1 Announce Type: new Abstract: In this paper, the author first establish the connections between the selectively $k$-star-ccc properties, the chain conditions and other star-Lindel\"of properties. Secondly, some examples are presented to solve questions raised by Xuan and Song about the selectively $k$-star-ccc spaces.
item.dc:creator: Yuan Sun
